categories: Category:Battles of the Melida/Daan Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Bin occurred at some point between the Twenty-First Battle of Zehava circa 94 BBY and the Twenty-Second Battle of Zehava three years later. It was one of the many struggles of the Melida/Daan Civil War. Pinani died during that battle in an attempt to avenge her husband Quintama's death.
